casebody.data:
RICHMOND
v.
GEORGE, et al. 196P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 28, 2017 Natalia K. Isenberg, Attorney at Law, Bryan T. Simpson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for George, Robert M. Paul A. Tharp, Attorney at Law, Matthew R. Arnold, Attorney at Law, J. Bradley Smith, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Richmond, Maeghan. Patrick H. Flanagan, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Sipe, Vidal A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of June 2017 by Defendant (Robert M. George) for Leave to File Reply to Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari, Petition for Writ of Supersedeas, and Motion for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of July 2017."
